decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01A Received: 27/02/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the following times: Monday to Saturday 11000 to 2300 and Sunday and Bank Holidays 1100 to 2200.

Condition : 4 - The extract system hereby approved shall comprise of a three-stage system to include a grease, pre-carbon and carbon filter. The duct as shown on the approved plans shall terminate one metre above the eaves or one metre above any openable windows of adjacent premises, whichever is the higher. The duct shall terminate pointing upwards. A cowl shall be omitted and lightweight flaps or other covers, which open when the system is powered, should be fitted. The system shall be routinely serviced and kept in good working order.

Condition : 5 - The rating level of noise emitted from fixed plant on the site, shall be lower than the existing background noise level by 10dB. The noise levels shall be determined at the nearest noise sensitive locations. The measurements shall be made according to BS4142:1997.

Condition : 6 - The use shall not commence until a secure storage area within the site to house at least one 1100 litre galvanised steel Eurobin has been identified and made available, together with facilities for the separation and storage of glass, metal, plastics, cardboard, food waste and other recyclable materials which shall then be collected and taken to a suitable facility for recycling.  The storage area and bins shall be made permanently available before the development is first occupied and no waste shall be stored outside the site or other than in the designated area.  The lids of the Eurobins shall be kept shut at all times other than when waste is being emptied into them.  Non-recyclable and perishable waste shall be removed from site no less frequently than once a week.
description: Change of use from A1 to A3/A5, installation of extractor flue to the shop and alterations to the rear elevation
